sessions.title: A Rank Missions
sessions.description: The A Rank Missions are only assigned to to highly experienced ninja. With these missions you are able to unlock teamleaders.

sessions.title: B Rank Missions
sessions.description: The B Rank Missions are only assigned to to experienced ninja. With these missions you are able to unlock villians and subordinates of the most dangerous ninjas.

goals.text: Win 8 battles with Haku. (8/8)

sessions.title: D and C Rank Missions
sessions.description: The D and C Rank Missions are assigned to new and unexperienced ninja. With these missions you are able to unlock notably the Sound ninja.

goals.text: Use Uchiha Sasuke's "Chidori" on an enemy affected by "Sharingan" 5 times. (5/5)

sessions.title: Five Kage Summit Missions
sessions.description: The five kages are reunited to discuss how to deal with Akatsuki. With these missions you are able to unlock ninjas that participated in Five Kage Summit Arc.

sessions.title: Fourth Shinobi World War Pt. 1 Missions
sessions.description: Tobi declared war against the five Kages and the leader of the Land of Iron. With these missions you are able to unlock ninjas that participated in the beginning of Fourth Shinobi World War.

missions.title: The Child of Rain
missions.section: Fourth Shinobi World War Pt. 1 Missions

sessions.title: S Rank Missions
sessions.description: The S Rank Missions are only assigned to the best of the best. With these missions you are able to unlock legendary ninja and hokages.

sessions.title: Shippuuden Missions
sessions.description: The Shippuuden Missions are the newest missions in town! With these missions you are able to unlock many new characters and upgrades to existing characters.

sessions.title: Tales Missions
sessions.description: With the Tales Mission, you are able to unlock ninjas that participated in past events.

goals.text: Use Hyuuga Neji's "Gentle Fist" 8 times. (8/8)
Use Hyuuga Hinata's "Gentle Fist" 8 times. (8/8)
